title: ZachXBT impersonators on the prowl for potential victims: Report
description:
Michael Khekoian, an executive at Wallet Guard, told Cointelegraph that numerous fraudulent accounts have surfaced after ZachXBT deactivated his account.

Social media is circulating with reports of multiple accounts posing as prominent blockchain investigator ZachXBT, known for publicly exposing fraudulent cryptocurrency projects, following the deactivation of his official account.

In a post on X (formerly Twitter), Michael Khekoian, partnership director at Web3 security firm Wallet Guard, pointed out to his 12,700 followers that the prominent blockchain investigator is being impersonated to scam people.

Cointelegraph reached out to ZachXBT for comment, but did not receive a response in time for publication”

Read more

title: Alibaba Cloud Unveils Cutting-Edge AI Text-to-Video Generator
description: In an age where artificial intelligence continues to push the boundaries of technological innovation, a new collaboration between artists and university researchers is emerging to safeguard the intellectual property of creative minds. title: Ripple CTO addresses ‘Bitcoin Ponzi’ claim; positive trends for Injective and InQubeta
